summary: Vehicle management app: implement and surface a vehicle ownership revocation (pencabutan kepemilikan) flow, and adjust its UI placement/visibility (user wants it accessible from the main menu; user reports Vehicle Detail Page not visible).
known_issues: User tidak dapat menemukan/melihat Halaman Detail Kendaraan (Vehicle Detail Page) untuk mengakses tombol 'Cabut Kepemilikan'.

existing_features.title: Add a main-menu entry point for the existing ownership revocation flow so users can access it from the primary navigation (menu utama), not only from the Vehicle Detail page. This must be user-visible in the top navigation (AppHeader) and must use English labeling (e.g., "Revoke Ownership").

Add a Dashboard (home) "Quick Action" entry point for ownership revocation, placed alongside existing Dashboard quick actions, with English user-facing text. The action must guide the user into a revoke flow by first selecting a vehicle (if needed) and then continuing to the existing PIN-verified revocation process.

Improve discoverability of the existing Vehicle Detail page so users can clearly find and open it from the vehicle list and immediately after registering a vehicle. Do not change the existing route path (`/vehicles/$vehicleId`).

new_feature_requests.summary: Tampilkan fitur 'Cabut Kepemilikan' (ownership revocation) di Menu Utama agar mudah diakses, bukan hanya di halaman Detail Kendaraan.

projectName: Expose ownership revocation from main menu and improve discoverability of Vehicle Detail page
